  The linearGradient() function helps you to create a linear gradient color background
 */function linearGradient(color,colorState){let angle=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:310;return`linear-gradient(${angle}deg, ${color}, ${colorState})`;}export default linearGradient;
